My name is Binyamin Tal
And I am working at Allalouf LTD for 4 years now.
Allalouf if the official representative of Grimaldi at Israel Since 1967.
My role in Allalouf is an Operational representative, which meand, briefly,
that i am physically meeting with all parties (Crew memberes, Port, Customs, tourists etc...).
In more relevant words, I know how things work(moves) in practice.
